mapper.select: SELECT id, email, name, role, is_deleted AS isDeleted, created_at AS createdAt FROM user ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT id, email, password, name, birth_date AS birthDate, gender, phone, address, profile_image_url AS profileImageUrl, provider, role, is_deleted AS isDeleted, created_at AS createdAt FROM user WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 'N'

SELECT id, email, password, name, birth_date AS birthDate, gender, phone, address, profile_image_url AS profileImageUrl, provider, role, is_deleted AS isDeleted, created_at AS createdAt FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND is_deleted = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( email, password, name, birth_date, gender, phone, address, profile_image_url, provider, role, is_deleted, created_at ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{provider}, #{role}, 'N', NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, profile_image_url = #{profileImageUrl} WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 'N'

SELECT id, email, password, name, birth_date AS birthDate, gender, phone, address, profile_image_url AS profileImageUrl, provider, role, is_deleted AS isDeleted, created_at AS createdAt FROM user WHERE role = #{role} AND is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY created_at DESC
